derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English castrel, perhaps from casserelle, dialect variant of Old French crecerelle, perhaps imitative of its call

entry.def: A kestrel is a small bird of prey.

means.word_mean: 2. small Old World falcon that hovers in the air against a wind
